alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 10:00AM EDT until June 21 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1045 AM EDT. * At 1000 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Doak Campbell Stadium, or over Florida A and M, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Griffin Heights, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Governors Square Mall, Midtown, Apalachee Ridge Estates, Levy Park, Indian Head Acres, Chaires Crossroads, Baum and Maclay State Gardens. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
